data.name: Zardy's Maze 2
data.detailed_description:
[Note: Playing Zardy's Maze 1 is not a requirement for playing Zardy's Maze 2]

You've fallen down a mysterious hole in the middle of a corn maze... But what horrors await you deep underground?

Leave the Surface

Strange, giant plants sprouted from underneath the field of corn. Terrifying scarecrows appeared and began chasing you around until you ultimately fell down a giant hole. When you awoke, you realized you were somewhere strange. But most importantly you were not safe.

Adapt to the Underground

The subterranean world under the farm is full of surprises. From scary monsters to peculiar puzzles, you must overcome each obstacle that stands in your way. Collect tools on your journey to help aid you in your quest. Climb rocks, cut vines, and crawl through the dirt. You will navigate dark mazes and large open spaces while you run from those who hunt you down in the dark.

Uncover What Lies Below

Zardy and his familiar troop of horrors stand in your way. You will need to listen, watch, and move carefully through 3D earthy labyrinths as you utilize equipment you find on your journey. Delve deeper into the underground and avoid getting caught as you try to uncover the mystery beneath the farm.

data.short_description: Beneath the farm something terrible awaits. You fell down a giant hole into a dark world full of terrifying scarecrows and monsters. Now you must make your way through the tunnels deep underground while watching your back. Solve puzzles, find tools, and most importantlyâ€¦ Stay alive!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 TI
  • Additional Notes: Graphics settings available for lower spec machines
